title: Quick-Prep Slow Cooker Comfort Food Meals
description: From prep to pot in 15 minutes or less, these top-rated slow cooker comfort food recipes are just right for super-busy days and cooking burnouts.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Slow Cooker Comfort Food Meals That Go From Prep to Pot in Minutes By Vanessa Greaves Vanessa Greaves Vanessa Greaves is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes with nearly two decades of experience helping home cooks gain confidence in the kitchen. A self-taught cook who grew up reading cookbooks for fun, Vanessa lives and breathes the challenges faced by busy everyday cooks to get dinner on the table. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on July 9, 2020 Close Credits: Creative Side of Me You're going to love how quickly and easily these slow cooker comfort food recipes come together. Best of all, these recipes really do live up to the promise of one-pot cooking because you don't have to dirty up any extra pans to get ingredients ready for the crockpot. Keep these ideas handy for when you just don't have the time (or energy) to prepare a meal. 01 of 15 Slow Cooker Chicken and Salsa View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen This three-ingredient recipe sounds way too simple to be good, but reviewers can't stop raving about it. Ponawanda says she got two great meals out of it for her family of four. 02 of 15 Slow Cooker Carnitas View Recipe Save Tammy Lynn Rub a boneless pork shoulder with a handful of spices you probably already have in your pantry to get a big pot of mouthwatering Mexican-style meat you can stuff into tacos, enchiladas, and burritos. Cooked in this quantity, it's a perfect candidate for make-and-freeze meals to stash away for your busiest nights. 03 of 15 Chicken Cacciatore in a Slow Cooker View Recipe Save Tammy Lynn Feel free to use chicken thighs instead of skinless boneless chicken breasts in this saucy recipe because they really do stand up better to hours of slow cooking. Try it both ways and see which one you prefer. 04 of 15 Slow Cooker Thai Peanut Pork View Recipe Save Marisa R. You can use a pork loin roast instead of the pork chops called for in the recipe. It's especially delicious served over fragrant coconut rice. 05 of 15 Hungarian Goulash II View Recipe Save Susan You can cut up the beef chuck roast the night before you plan to make this, whisk the sauce together, and stash everything in the fridge. Then pop it all into the slow cooker in the morning, turn it on, and get on with your day. Could it be any easier? 06 of 15 Mother's Pot Roast View Recipe Save Delly The basic recipe calls for five simple ingredients, but you can easily add carrots and potatoes to make this a complete meal. Talk about one-pot convenience. 07 of 15 Frank's Favorite Slow-Cooker Thai Chicken View Recipe Save kkupcake037 Many reviewers said they were skeptical about combining salsa and peanut butter to make this recipe, but in the end, they were won over by the flavor. "Amazing! Usually, my attempts at slow cooking are bland failures, but this turned out incredible." — Deschions 08 of 15 Flaming Slow Cooker Pork View Recipe Save Janet Henderson "Love this recipe! I make this frequently on the weekends then freeze it for easy meals during the week. I usually make 2 separate freezer meals from this. So delicious and easy!" — laurenherlache 09 of 15 Honey-Garlic Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs View Recipe Save Myrna "Delicious! These were cooked perfectly. I used 6 bl/sl thighs, but kept the sauce ingredients the same. After the thighs were cooked, I took them out of the slow cooker and stirred in a little cornstarch slurry to thicken the sauce, which worked out great." — Christina 10 of 15 Slow Cooker Turkey Chili View Recipe Save Tel703 "The cayenne and the hot pepper sauce is what determines how spicy it gets," says lala, who submitted the recipe. "So start with the little that I recommended and then you can always add more." 11 of 15 Zesty Slow Cooker Chicken Barbecue View Recipe Save Creative Side of Me "Throw the chicken breasts in frozen, and serve with baked potatoes," recipe creator Zanne says. 12 of 15 Salsa Verde Pork View Recipe Save France C "This turned out wonderful. It can't get any easier. Loin roasts tend to be dry, this wasn't. Slow cooker pork barbeques tend to be soggy, this wasn't. It's a leaner cut, so it's lower fat. The salsa verde is a nice change from the typical Carolina style," Howard Wimbrow says. 13 of 15 Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Tikka Masala View Recipe Save Hey Gil "This is the perfect answer to Indian take out. Usually, we order Indian about once a week and this was just as good," writes SHIRLEY122. "The lemon at the end really makes it balance perfectly. I made some basmati rice, salad, and naan to round out the meal. Delicious! Will definitely make again." 10 Best Slow Cooker Indian Recipes 14 of 15 Hamburger Soup II View Recipe Save lutzflcat "My daughter and I prepared the ingredients the night before and assembled in the crockpot. In the morning I put it on for an hour to remove the chill from the pot and then cooked on low for about 12 hours. It was wonderful." — DIANNEM527 15 of 15 Creamy Hatch Chile and Mushroom Chicken Breasts View Recipe Save Yoly "I shredded my chicken breast and mixed it in with the rice," recipe creator Yoly says. "We're going through a stay-at-home order due to the Coronavirus pandemic, and this was a great meal to make with items that I already had."
